mapper.select:
select ma.ma_name goodName, ma.ma_tip des, '1' type, ma.ma_rate rate, ma.ma_sale_num saleNum, ma.create_time sendTime, ma.tips tips, ma.user_id ownerId, ma.ma_id id, jud.user_nick_name createUser, oa.ma_id have, ma.ma_price price from jsoup_mission_all ma left join jsoup_user_detail jud on ma.user_id = jud.user_id left join order_jsoup_ma oa on oa.ma_id = ma.ma_id where
ma.tips like concat('%',#{tip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
ma.ma_name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
ma.ma_id = #{id} and
ma.user_id =#{userId} and
ma.create_time > #{leftDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ma.create_time < #{rightDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ma.user_id != #{currentUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ma.ma_state = 2 order by
saleNum,
rate ,
sendTime DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{pageEnd}

select ma.mission_all_name goodName, ma.mission_all_dis des, '2' type, ma.sale_rate rate, ma.sale_num saleNum, ma.sent_time sendTime, ma.tips tips, ma.user_id ownerId, ma.mission_all_history_id id, jud.user_nick_name createUser, oa.mh_id have, ma.sale_price price from jsoup_mission_all_history ma left join jsoup_user_detail jud on ma.user_id = jud.user_id left join order_jsoup_mh oa on oa.mh_id = ma.mission_all_history_id where
ma.tips like concat('%',#{tip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
ma.mission_all_name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') and
ma.mission_all_history_id = #{id} and
ma.user_id =#{userId} and
ma.sent_time > #{leftDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ma.sent_time < #{rightDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
ma.user_id != #{currentUser,jdbcType=INTEGER} and ma.on_sale = '1' order by
saleNum,
rate ,
sendTime DESC LIMIT #{pageStart},#{pageEnd}

select ma.ma_id id, ma.ma_name name, ma.ma_tip des, ma.create_time as 'time', ma.ma_price price, ma.ma_rate rate, ma.tips tips, ud.user_nick_name, ma.ma_sale_num saleNum, 1 type, ma.user_id userId from jsoup_mission_all ma left join jsoup_user_detail ud on ud.user_id = ma.user_id where ma.ma_id = #{maId}

select ma.mission_all_history_id id, ma.mission_all_name name, ma.mission_all_dis des, ma.sent_time as 'time', ma.sale_price price, ma.sale_rate rate, ma.tips tips, ud.user_nick_name, ma.sale_num saleNum, 1 type, ma.user_id userId from jsoup_mission_all_history ma left join jsoup_user_detail ud on ud.user_id = ma.user_id where ma.mission_all_history_id = #{mhId}

select jc.*, ud.user_nick_name userName, ud.user_des userDes, ud.user_lever userLever from jsoup_comment jc left join order_jsoup_mh oh on oh.order_id = jc.connent_id left join jsoup_user_detail ud on jc.user_id = ud.user_id where jc.type_id = #{type} and oh.mh_id = #{connectId} and jc.deep = 0 limit #{start} ,#{end}

select act.title title, act.user_id userId, act.id id, act.update_time updateTime, ud.user_nick_name user_defined_type_name from jsoup_article act left join jsoup_user_detial ud on act.user_id = ud.user_id where
act.user_id = #{articleSearchVo.userId} and
act.title = concat('%',#{articleSearchVo.title},'%') and
1 = 1 limit #{articleSearchVo.pageStart},#{articleSearchVo.pageEnd}

select oa.create_time sendTime, ma.ma_name goodName, jc.comment des, 1 type, ud.user_nick_name createUser, oa.finish_price price, oa.order_id id from order_jsoup_ma oa left join jsoup_mission_all ma on ma.ma_id = oa.ma_id left join jsoup_user_detail ud on ud.user_id = ma.user_id left join jsoup_comment jc on jc.connect_id = oa.order_id and jc.type_id = 1 and jc.user_id = #{userId} where oa.customer_user_id = #{userId}

select oa.create_time sendTime, ma.mission_all_name goodName, jc.comment des, 2 type, ud.user_nick_name createUser, oa.finish_price price, oa.order_id id from order_jsoup_mh oa left join jsoup_mission_all_history ma on ma.mission_all_history_id = oa.mh_id left join jsoup_user_detail ud on ud.user_id = ma.user_id left join jsoup_comment jc on jc.connect_id = oa.order_id and jc.type_id = 2 and jc.user_id = #{userId} where oa.customer_user_id = #{userId}

select jc.*, ud.user_nick_name userName, ud.user_des userDes, ud.user_lever userLever from jsoup_comment jc left join order_jsoup_ma oh on oh.order_id = jc.connent_id left join jsoup_user_detail ud on jc.user_id = ud.user_id where jc.type_id = #{type} and oh.ma_id = #{connectId} and jc.deep = 0 limit #{start} ,#{end}

select jc.*, ud.user_nick_name userName, ud.user_des userDes, ud.user_lever userLever from jsoup_comment jc left join jsoup_user_detail ud on jc.user_id = ud.user_id where jc.type_id = #{type} and jc.connect_id = #{connectId} and jc.deep = 0 limit #{start} ,#{end}
